***** Hindi[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
Borrowed from Classical_Persian بلا‎ (balā), from Arabic بَلَاء‎ (balāʔ).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * (Delhi Hindi) IPA(key): /bə.lɑː/, [bə.l̪äː]
**** Noun[edit] ****
बला • (balā) f (Urdu spelling بلا‎)
   1. misfortune, affliction
   2. spirit, hag
   3. (informal) a vast amount (of)
*** Declension[edit] ***
Declension of बला (fem ā-stem)
                                    singular plural
                           direct   बला      बलाएँ
                                    balā     balāẽ
                           oblique  बला      बलाओं
                                    balā     balāõ
                           vocative बला      बलाओ
                                    balā     balāo
***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [bəla]
**** Noun[edit] ****
बला • (balā) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐧𑐮𑐵)
   1. arrow
